description: Lovely, recently renovated co-op residence situated in the sought-after Bay Terrace district. This abode boasts hardwood flooring, freshly remodeled bathrooms, a modern eat-in kitchen, contemporary front-loading washer/dryer, ample dining space, expansive living quarters, three generous bedrooms, and abundant storage. The master bedroom features both a conventional closet and a bespoke closet wall unit. Numerous large windows provide abundant natural light from various angles

Gorgeous updated co-op unit located in the highly desirable Bay Terrace area. This residence showcases hardwood floors, newly renovated bathrooms, a modernized eat-in kitchen, sleek front-loading washer/dryer, spacious dining area, sizable living space, three roomy bedrooms, and ample storage options. The master bedroom boasts both a standard closet and a customized closet wall unit. Large windows throughout offer plenty of natural light from various orientations
